text: Jan Reehorst (21 March 1923 - 4 June 2024) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. From 1953 until 1973 he was a member of the municipal council, and from 1967 to 1973 also an alderman of Rotterdam. Between 1956 and 1967 he was a member of the House of Representatives. In 1973 he became mayor of Velsen and from 1977 until 1984 he was mayor of Haarlem. Reehorst was born in Rotterdam, Netherlands. He turned 100 in March 2023. Reehorst died in Haarlem on 4 June 2024, at the age of 101.Oud-burgemeester Jan Reehorst (101) van Haarlem en Velsen overleden: ’Zijn levendigheid en scherpe geest vielen op’ ==References== ==Other websites== * Parlement.com Category:1923 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch mayors Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from North Holland Category:Politicians from Rotterdam Category:People from Haarlem Category:People from Velsen Category:Dutch centenarians
title: Jan Reehorst
